title: Video: Seasfire – Heartbeat
body:
You know when you get back from a festival, discover a new act and find out that you missed them playing at said festival? Well, it turns out that I missed Bristol quartet **Seasfire** at The Great Escape, and having just heard their new single _Heartbeat_, it’s safe to say that gutted doesn’t even begin to cover it.

It’s a fairly fragile, desolate affair, and has dollops of **The Postal Service** spattered unashamedly throughout, yet works somehow as the perfect pop gem that it is. Check out the decidedly cliched black and white video below.

Well, it turns out that I missed Bristol quartet Seasfire at The Great Escape, and having just heard their new single Heartbeat, it’s safe to say that gutted doesn’t even begin \[…\]
